name: umbraco.devtools
description: A browser extension to help with debugging the Webcomponent based Umbraco backoffice V13+

scripts.start:firefox: npm run copy:manifest:firefox && web-ext run --source-dir extension/ --browser-console --devtools --start-url https://ashy-bay-09f36a803.1.azurestaticapps.net
scripts.start:firefox:developer: npm run copy:manifest:firefox && web-ext run --source-dir extension/ --firefox firefoxdeveloperedition --browser-console --devtools --start-url https://ashy-bay-09f36a803.1.azurestaticapps.net
scripts.start:chromium: npm run copy:manifest:chromium && web-ext run --source-dir extension/ --target chromium --browser-console --devtools --start-url https://ashy-bay-09f36a803.1.azurestaticapps.net
scripts.package:firefox: npm run copy:manifest:firefox && web-ext build --source-dir extension/ --verbose --overwrite-dest --filename {name}-{version}-Firefox.zip
scripts.package:chromium: npm run copy:manifest:chromium && web-ext build --source-dir extension/ --verbose --overwrite-dest --filename {name}-{version}-Chromium.zip

author: Warren Buckley
